Body:
"""test that arguments passed to the body()
        function are accessible by top-level defs"""
l = lookup.TemplateLookup()
l.put_string('base', """

        ${next.body(x=12)}

        """)
l.put_string('main',
    """
            <%inherit file="base"/>
            <%page args="x"/>
            this is main.  x is ${x}

            ${a()}

            <%def name="a(**args)">
                this is a, x is ${x}
            </%def>
        """
    )
eq_(result_lines(l.get_template('main').render()), ['this is main. x is 12',
    'this is a, x is 12'])
l.put_string('another',
    """
            <%namespace name="ns" file="main"/>

            ${ns.body(x=15)}
        """
    )
eq_(result_lines(l.get_template('another').render()), [
    'this is main. x is 15', 'this is a, x is 15'])
